import "./style.css"; import { useState, Fragment } from "react"; import Hero from "../components/Hero"; import strings from "../strings.json"; import Button from "../components/Button"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-grid-system"; export default () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(2); return
{strings.english.Header.OurMission} {strings.english.Header.Terms}
{step === 0 &&

} {step === 1 &&

Choose your bank

The following banks have released a form for freezing your mortgage.

} {step === 2 &&

}
